subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Josh Beckett, who has been hampered by a strained oblique muscle, will return to the mound for Game 2 of the A. L. C. S. against the Rays on Saturday night.
snippet: Josh Beckett, who has been hampered by a strained oblique muscle, will return to the mound for Game 2 of the A. L. C. S. against the Rays on Saturday night.
